ygData.subject: A question about Enchant Silver
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone- I ve been lurking on the list for the last week or so and have found your discussions very valuable as a beginning jeweler.  Last night I made
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone-

I've been lurking on the list for the last week or so and have found your
discussions very valuable as a beginning jeweler. Last night I made level 8
and would like to obtain the Enchant Silver spell. It is my understanding the
spell is located in the Library in Neriak, a place to which I haven't been.

My question is: as a high-elf enchanter, am I KOS in Neriak? (I'm betting
probably so...) If so, what strategies did you use to obtain the spell? I have
not seen anyone in in Greater Faydark selling the spell on the Erollisi Marr
server.

Your comments will be most helpful. Thanks!


Christine
known Minbari on Erollisi Marr
